duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee the planning, tracking, production, and installation of graphic elements for specific projects, ensuring schedule, budget, and design integrity.
Manage graphics for large-scale museums, including project planning and budget management.
Support potential new projects by estimating graphic fabrication and managing the submittals of color palettes, samples & prototypes.
Ensure that designer intent is upheld, and monitor and track graphic production both internally and with subcontractors daily.
Read, review and mark-up fabrication detail drawings, and prepare for technical specifications.
Ensure an expected level of quality and execution, and approve final inspection of graphics.

education_certification.credential: Preferred BA/BFA in Design or Graphics, or equivalent educational background.
